title: Heterocycles as supramolecular handles for crystal engineering: a case study with 7-(diethylamino)coumarin derivatives
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20824-20836
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03656E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Geraldyne Castro, Margarita Romero-Ávila, Norberto Farfán, Rafael Arcos-Ramos, Mauricio Maldonado-Domínguez
The 7-(diethylamino)coumarin core encodes in its structure the supramolecular information needed for its predictable self-assembly in organic molecular solids.
